entry.title: 5FT Black Rectangular Stretch Spandex Tablecloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2250
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 11.98 - 272.18 (2 variants)

Material: Spandex
Color: Black
Size: Fits 5 foot rectangular table (about 60x30 inches)
How to Care: Machine Washable,Tumble Dry, Low Heat
The seam of the tablecloth will be approximately 4" below the edge of your table on only 2 sides. This is not a defect, but part of the design.

entry.title: White Round Spandex Cocktail Table Cover With Natural Wavy Drapes
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2254
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 20.99

[About]

Quantity: 1 Cocktail Table Cover
Material: Spandex
Color: White
Size: Fits up to 32" Round Cocktail Tables with 43" Height
Hemmed edges on the bottom.
On a Standard Cocktail Table, it drapes to the tip of the floor
Can also fit smaller size Cocktail Table with past floor length draping.
Features: Naturally drapes, loose fit, easy slip-on cover
How to Care: Machine Washable, Tumble Dry, Low Heat
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    Additional Information:

    • Our Wavy Spandex Cocktail Table Cover design differs from other spandex table covers by providing a naturally draped base rather than a fitted slope.
    • For Tablecloth only, decorations not included
    • Uses - Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration

entry.title: 8FT Gold Fitted Polyester Rectangular Table Cover
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2252
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 12.99 - 296.19 (2 variants)

[About]


Quantity: 1 Fitted Rectangular Table Cover
Material: Polyester
Color: Gold
Size: 96" length x 30" wide x 30" tall. 
Thickness: 200 GSM
Tablecloth comes in a seamless, 1pc design.
Stain & wrinkle resistant
Intended to be used for 8 feet banquet rectangle tables.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.


[Information]

8FT Polyester Fitted Rectangle Tablecloth

Premium quality polyester tablecloths with perfect fitting are a perfect choice to accommodate all your indoor and outdoor table decorating needs. Transform your dreary and lackluster party tables and table covers into elegant tablescapes by swathing with these chic beauties. The top quality polyester material will not only spruce your Party tables up, but is sturdy and durable enough to withstand the heavy duty usage during outdoor carnivals, culinary events, weddings, as well as indoor tea parties, birthdays, and holiday dinners. 

Stain & Wrinkle Resistant

 The classy fitted style adds a visual element to any table settings while giving a protective and decorative effect to your banquet or wedding tables. Let these upscale tablecloths glam your party tables up by exuding style, class, and elegance. Plan as many events as you want and invite as many guest as you desire without even worrying about the expenses and your budget. With our sturdy and economical polyester tablecloths, you can now transform any dining experience into a magnificent feast with an upscale feel and an elite look without breaking the banks. 

Multi-Use

Get inspired by this premium quality polyester tablecloth that opens the gates of creativity and ingenuity. With such a high standard material that can withstand any heavy-duty events and extensive reuse, our fitted polyester tablecloth is an ideal choice to enhance the elegance of your party and banquet tables. From the extensive array of colors, you can pick the perfect hue to coordinate with your party theme color.

 

Additional Information: 

  • How to Care: Tablecloths are machine washable. Use warm water wash, low temp dry.
  • For Tablecloth only, decorations not included
  • Uses : Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration


    Linen Care Instructions

Vendor: HIER_2254

Price: 6.99 - 124.99 (2 variants)

Material: Spandex
Color: White
Size: Fits a 8 foot table
Spandex-stretch tablecloth provides a snug, tailored fit
Easy to put on and take off
Machine washable, iron safe

  • Used for the top of the table only. Can use a different colored spandex tablecloth for the bottom. Mix and Match colors.
